data:
| Risk | Classification | Mitigation Plan |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Inadequate AI model training data | High | Implement data augmentation and validation techniques to ensure model accuracy. Regularly audit and update training data. |
| Unauthorized access to sensitive data | High | Implement strong access controls and encryption for sensitive data. Regularly audit access logs. |
| Inability to meet scalability demands | High | Implement autoscaling groups and cloud computing resources to handle increased load. Monitor system performance and adjust resources as needed. |
| Negative public opinion on AI use | Medium | Implement transparent communication strategies to educate users on AI use and benefits. Regularly gather feedback and make improvements. |
| Energy consumption | Medium | Implement energy-efficient hardware and cloud computing resources. Monitor energy usage and make adjustments as needed. |
| Dependence on AI model providers | Medium | Implement contingency plans for AI model provider outages. Regularly evaluate and switch to alternative providers as needed. |
| Unfriendly interfaces | Medium | Implement user-friendly interface designs. Regularly gather feedback and make improvements. |
| Lack of feedback | Low | Implement feedback mechanisms such as surveys and user testing. Regularly gather feedback and make improvements. |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities | Low | Implement prioritization frameworks such as MoSCoW (Must have, Should have, Could have, Won't have). Regularly gather feedback and adjust priorities as needed. |
| Low visibility on social media | Low | Implement social media marketing strategies. Regularly monitor social media presence and adjust strategies as needed. |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality | Low | Implement learning analytics and assessment tools. Regularly gather feedback and adjust assessment methods as needed. |
| AI use regulations | Low | Implement compliance monitoring and reporting. Regularly review and adjust to changes in regulations. |

Mitigation plans for out-of-scope items:

| Out-Of-Scope Item | Mitigation Plan |
| --- | --- |
| Official certifications | PREVENT-IA does not provide or evaluate official certifications. |
| Access permits for construction sites or high-risk work activities | PREVENT-IA does not manage access permits. |
| Consultation of specific project data within the organization | PREVENT-IA does not allow the consultation of specific project data. |
| Personal assistant features | PREVENT-IA does not include personal assistant features. |
| Gamification features | PREVENT-IA does not include gamification features. |
| Language learning platform | PREVENT-IA is not a language learning platform. |
